title: Heartshaped Shards
description: Fragile, bitter and scarred inside and out thanks to a horrible childhood and an even worse marriage, Kate Kincaid would just as soon never talk to a man again. But thanks to the dedicated work of a therapist-turned-friend, Kate's faith in the male species is eventually restored.Through an assortment of emotionally unashamed, loving and caring men she meets in Ireland and Scotland, she finds the power within herself to love again. But will her newly found confidence be enough to convince her to take another ride on the Marry Go Round?
author: Ria MacAlister
